captions.text:
You’re perfect 
one to eleven

God would be 
surprised making you

I approach you slowly 
You run away and I chase you

This is more tiring and takes more
Time than a marathon

This is Tom and Jerry 
Don’t know when it’ll finish

Let’s stop this 
hide and seek

But the way you text, 
it’s like a work of god

I hold on to you harder 
But you slip away like sand

I don’t know what’s missing 
Baby just tell me
I stayed up all night

Why did you say those things
To make my heart flutter

I’m kicking my sheets again
Can’t fall asleep

I know it all
I’m Brand New Man

What do you not like?
Just say it now

I go a step closer 
You step away two steps

Why are you
like this

No movies, we ate already 
What u want

what what what u want baby
what what what u want baby

Just say it, I’ll do it 
Come to me

I've send more than 
ten texts before you did

You shouldn't be like this 
I've been ignoring other ones

Those girls would be 
Swearing about me

Tell me if you don’t like it 
I 
 feel like I’m trapped in a jail

I used to hear 
that I’m a bad boy

Girls were all over me 
Fly boy

But I can’t do 
anything about you

I’m like a dog on 
a leash, panting

What You Want babe 
Tell me what you want, to me

Don’t say ‘Whatever’ 
I don’t like that

I ask you to do something 
But you say maybe tomorrow

It’s already 5 and 
you've eaten?

How did you watch a movie
That opened today

Not only music but 
I’m a Brand New boy

What do you not like?
Just say it now

I go a step closer 
You step away two steps

No movies, we ate already 
What u want

what what what u want baby
what what what u want baby

Just say it, I’ll do it 
Come to me

A girl, just tell me 
I’ll do what you want, it’s easy
Just call me now babe

A girl, just tell me 
I’ll do what you want, it’s easy
Just call me now babe

I go a step closer 
You step away two steps

No movies, we ate already 
What u want

what what what u want baby
what what what u want baby

Just say it, I’ll do it 
Come to me

You’re almost mine, almost not 
Why are you doing this

We’re not friends but we’re not lovers 
What u want

what what what u want baby 
what what what u want baby

Just say it, I’ll do it 
Come to me

title: [MV] Kanto(칸토) _ What You Want(말만해) (Feat. Kim Sung Kyu)(김성규)

comments.text:
Popular location for filming. Dont get me wrong I like the look styling etc 
and love all the mv's shot there but keeping count. Watching old WGM 
thought a wedding photo shoot location looked like this as well but idk. 
﻿

comments.text:
I came here for Sunggyu (who is my ultimate bias) but Kanto really blew me 
away. This song is really catchy and at first I was skeptical of how 
Sunggyu's voice would fit into this song but their voices went surprisingly 
well together. I will definitely check out more of Kanto's other songs!﻿

comments.text:
This song has such a relaxed laid back feel to it and it's not even filled 
with all the disgusting language that so many hip-hop artists seem to be 
using all the time at the moment. I don't have a problem with swearing (I 
swear quite a lot :p), it's just if there's too much it can be really 
unpleasant to listen too.
Kanto really nailed it (and so did sunggyu!) 
hwaiting~~!!﻿
